package.name: CompactBatteryAvocado
package.shortDescription: Show battery percentage on 2x2 battery widget

descriptionlist.description:
Show battery percent on 2x2 battery widget (iOS 14)


This package tested to be working on iOS 14.3. Might or might not work on other iOS version.



To support development: https://www.paypal.me/udevs

changelog.change:
NEW FEATURES:
•Added customizable percentage position: left, right, center, top and bottom

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Fixed some eagles with eagle eyes complaining about my 69 digits
